{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mist Systems |model=AP21 |revision= |asin=B075K36CBL;IN; |series=AC1300 |fcc_date=09/01/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model=RVRB03 |manuf_rev= |type=access point |fcc_id=2AHBN-AP21 |ic_id=4441A-AP21 |pcb_id=48RVRB03.0GB |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47452;BCM47452B0KRFBG, HN1702 P20, 262-51 P3A W; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G08ABAFAWP |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GG6KB-12 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47452;BCM47452B0KRFBG, HN1702 P20, 262-51 P3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Wistron NeWeb DNXB-33 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43520;BCM43520KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG, TE1643 P30, 636997-02 38 W; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-11;SKY11, 85712, 509VR;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth LE, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|High Performance Gigabit Wi-Fi Wave 2 Access Point}} :[https://www.mist.com/products/ Product page] {{•}} [https://www.mist.com/wp-content/uploads/Mist-AP21-Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] *"48BNXB33.SGB" and "2016/03/03" are silkscreened on the back :of the Mini PCIe card in the FCC photos. *"48RVRB03.0GB" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The datasheet seems to claim 802.11ac support at 2.4GHz with proprietary :clients saying, "2x2:2 802.11b/g/n/ac up to 400 Mbps data rate. :802.11ac for VHT capable Proprietary clients." This product supposedly has a Dedicated Third Radio for "2.4 & 5 GHz dual-band :WIDS/WIPS, spectrum analysis & location analytics radio" not for clients. The Real Simultaneous Dual Band (RSDB) feature of the BCM47452 may be used :to enable the third radio while limiting 802.11bgn support to 1x1:1. ===Reviews=== *[https://blog.ianbeyer.com/2018/05/08/mist-deployment-part-the-first/ ''Mist Deployment (Part The First)'' on '''The CaNerdIan'''] ===See also=== :;[https://www.ajpsolutions.co.uk/products/mist-systems/ Mist Systems Products] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Mist Systems AP21]] • FCC ID: 2AHBN-AP21 (2017-09-01) *[[Mist Systems AP33]] • FCC ID: 2AHBN-AP33 (2020-02-24) *[[Mist Systems AP41]] • FCC ID: 2AHBN-AP41 (2016-02-24) *[[Mist Systems AP43]] • FCC ID: 2AHBN-AP43 (2019-06-24) *[[Mist Systems AP61]] • FCC ID: 2AHBN-AP61 (2017-11-06) __NOTOC__
